about_the_game:
Do You Remember? is a single-player horror and exploration/puzzle story game with dream-like, nostalgic, and surreal yet realistic visuals.

Uncover a deep, engaging story with lore, secrets, and answers...

Story Overview (Spoiler-Free):

Suddenly, you find yourself in pain and alone in a strange, almost dream-like world, with no memory of who you are, your past, or the people you once knew. Even with no memory, something feels strange about this world. 

you are driven by an unshakable urge to pursue and reclaim yourself and your memories, But finding the answers is easier said than done. A constant, looming shadow of dread and inevitability is following you along your journey... the answers to your past and what lies ahead on the path.

Gameplay:

As you journey through this world, different voices speak to you, and you should determine which ones you want to listen to ( The "voices" show up as text on the screen ) but each voice has the potential to bring you down a different path. Find your way, solve puzzles, and discover the secrets and answers of the story to progress on your journey towards the end of the path.

Themes:

"Do You Remember?" is a unique blend of exploration, horror, and puzzle-solving. The game’s story explores themes of nostalgia, the fear of forgetting, death, and more.

Keep an eye out for the Demo, and the public beta playtest coming soon!

Developer notes.

  • Do You Remember? started as a concept in mid-late 2022 and has been in active development since late 2023. Created by Hematite0, a 16-year-old solo developer. This game has evolved through multiple iterations, shaping itself into something larger than initially anticipated.

  • This journey has come with many lessons and restarts, and I’m committed to supporting and expanding this game for years to come, continuing to update until it’s fully polished. Because games are such a complex, immersive, and unique art form, I want to ensure it evolves into the best experience possible.

  • I hope you enjoy this game, and please provide constructive feedback if you have any! this is my first game, its reasonably ambitious, and I'm making it solo, so any constructive feedback is valuable!

  • Made in Unreal Engine 5.5, Do You Remember? supports the latest Unreal Engine technologies like Lumen, Nanite, Nanite Tessellation, virtual shadow maps, and both software and hardware ray tracing. The game also includes support for DLSS 3.7, FSR 3.1, and XESS 1.3 to boost frame rates without sacrificing much quality.

name: Do You Remember?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: AMD ryzen 3100 / intel 7600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1630/1050TI or AMD Radeon RX 570 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: any DX12 gpu with support for shader model 6 (SM6) 4gb or more vram should be able to run the game at 30+fps.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: AMD ryzen 5600 / intel 12400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 8gb / Radeon RX 6600 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: 1080p or 1440p high settings with hardware ray tracing no upscaling or quality upscaling

short_description: You find yourself in a strange world, calm, but with no memory of anything before, not even who you were. You embark on a long journey trying to remember your past, discovering the secrets around you, and find answers. But the peril grows...
